A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely fantastic from beginning to end.. Jaw dropping\, edge of your seat action during the amazing battle scenes\, great storytelling. My only non-spoiler gripe (and it is a big one) is that it felt like the end of a trilogy rather than a middle offering (but that doesn't take away anything from the quality of the film). The spoiler-gripe will do for later day.. MVP Luke Skywalker/Mark Hamill.. Legendary
